trans-unit.source: Represents a new instance of the PeerObject class with an auto-generated <xref:System.Guid>.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma nova instância da classe PeerObject com um gerado automaticamente <xref:System.Guid>.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: A PeerObject is run-time data, such as a picture, certificate, or a specific description that is associated with a particular application.
trans-unit.target: Um PeerObject é os dados de tempo de execução, tais como uma imagem, certificado ou uma descrição específica que está associada uma aplicação específica.

trans-unit.source: The data element of each PeerObject instance must be less than or equal to 16KB in size.
trans-unit.target: O elemento de dados de cada instância de PeerObject tem de ser menor ou igual a 16KB de tamanho.

trans-unit.source: After an instance of PeerObject is constructed it is published with the Peer Collaboration Infrastructure via <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SetObject%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Depois de uma instância de PeerObject é construída está publicada com a infraestrutura de colaboração ponto a ponto através de <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SetObject%2A>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SetObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: After constructing an instance of this class and setting the appropriate properties this object may be passed to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration><xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SetObject%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.DeleteObject%2A> methods to enable/disable the publishing of this object for other peers to discover and view.
trans-unit.target: Depois de construir uma instância desta classe e definir as propriedades adequadas este objeto podem ser transmitidos para o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration> <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SetObject%2A>e <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.DeleteObject%2A>métodos para ativar/desativar a publicação deste objeto para outros elementos de rede detetar e ver.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.DeleteObject%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SetObject%2A></xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration>

trans-unit.source: After registering an object with the collaboration infrastructure the registration information is not persisted in the registry, resulting in different behavior from <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication> instances.
trans-unit.target: Depois de registar um objeto com a infraestrutura de colaboração as informações de registo não é continuada no registo, resultando no comportamento diferente do <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication>instâncias.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication>

trans-unit.source: The object registration is only valid for the lifetime duration of the application which registered the object.
trans-unit.target: O registo de objeto só é válido durante a duração da aplicação, registado o objeto.

trans-unit.source: Applications should deregister objects when they are no longer required or prior to application exit.
trans-unit.target: As aplicações devem anular o registo objetos quando que já não são necessários ou antes da aplicação de saída.

trans-unit.source: By default, a PeerObject is automatically deregistered if the instance goes out of scope.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, um PeerObject é automaticamente o registo dele se a instância ficar fora do âmbito.

trans-unit.source: Changing the properties on a PeerObject instance after it has been registered using the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration> registration methods will not update the registration for the PeerObject instance.
trans-unit.target: Alterar as propriedades numa instância PeerObject depois de ter sido registado utilizando o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration>os métodos de registo não irão atualizar o registo para a instância de PeerObject.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration>

trans-unit.source: To effectively update the registration of a specific PeerObject instance, the PeerObject must be deleted and registered again with the new information.
trans-unit.target: Para atualizar eficazmente o registo de uma instância de PeerObject específica, o PeerObject tem de ser eliminado e registado novamente com as novas informações de.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new default instance of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância predefinida do <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject> instance is constructed, the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SetObject%2A> method must be called to publish the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject> with the Peer Collaboration infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Depois do <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject>é criada a instância, o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SetObject%2A>método tem de ser chamado para publicar o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject>com a infraestrutura de colaboração ponto a ponto.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SetObject%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance with the associated parameters required for serialization.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> instância com os parâmetros associados necessários para a serialização.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> associados a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The serialization destination associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O destino de serialização associado a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance with the associated scope and data.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> instância com o âmbito associado e dados.

trans-unit.source: The `Id` parameter value utilized by this constructor is auto generated.
trans-unit.target: O `Id` valor do parâmetro utilizado por este construtor é automaticamente gerado.

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject> instance is constructed, the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SetObject%2A> method must be called to publish the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject> with the Peer Collaboration infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Depois do <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject>é criada a instância, o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SetObject%2A>método tem de ser chamado para publicar o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject>com a infraestrutura de colaboração ponto a ponto.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SetObject%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject>

trans-unit.source: The user-defined identifier for the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O identificador definido pelo utilizador para o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A data blob that contains information about the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um blob de dados que contém informações sobre o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is limited a size that is less than or equal to 16K.
trans-unit.target: Este parâmetro é limitado um tamanho inferior ou igual a 16K.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the scope in which the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> is to be registered.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o âmbito no qual o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> está a ser registado.

trans-unit.source: One of the arguments provided to this method is not valid.
trans-unit.target: Um dos argumentos fornecidos a este método não é válido.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets descriptive data associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance for a Peer Collaboration application.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o descritivos dados associados a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> instância para uma aplicação de colaboração ponto a ponto.

trans-unit.source: Descriptive data (such as text or a small image) associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Dados descritivos (como texto ou uma imagem de pequena) associados a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> instância foi eliminada.

trans-unit.source: One of the arguments provided to this method is not valid.
trans-unit.target: Um dos argumentos fornecidos a este método não é válido.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources utilized by the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Versões de todos os recursos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Liberta os recursos não geridos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> e opcionalmente liberta os recursos geridos.

trans-unit.source: Set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: Definido como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos geridos e; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos apenas não geridos.

trans-unit.source: Compares a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> to the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Compara um <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> para especificado <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance to test for equality.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> instância de teste de igualdade.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance provided has matching data, else <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> instância fornecida tem de correspondência de dados, outros <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The instance specified by other has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O instância especificada pelo other foi eliminado.

trans-unit.source: Compares the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Compara o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> para o objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The object to test for equality.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de teste de igualdade.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance provided has matching data, else <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> instância fornecida tem de correspondência de dados, outros <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The object specified by obj has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto especificado por obj foi eliminado.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instances are considered equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se especificado <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> instâncias são consideradas iguais.

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> para comparar.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: O segundo <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> para comparar.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instances provided have matching data, else <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> instâncias fornecidas tem de correspondência de dados, outros <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o código hash para o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code used to compare instances of this type.
trans-unit.target: Um 32 bits com sinal código hash de número inteiro utilizado para comparar as instâncias deste tipo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> instância foi eliminada.

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with the data required to serialize the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Preenche um <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> com os dados necessários para serializar especificado <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A derived type must call the base type <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Um tipo derivado tem de chamar o tipo base <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A>método.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> instance to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> instância para preencher com dados.

trans-unit.source: The destination for the serialization.
trans-unit.target: O destino para a serialização.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref:System.Guid> associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <xref:System.Guid>associados a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> instância.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Guid> associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> .
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Guid>associado a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> .</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> instância foi eliminada.

trans-unit.source: Signaled when a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance changes.
trans-unit.target: Quando assinalado um <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> instância alterações.

trans-unit.source: Before this event can be signaled by an object change, subscriptions must be made to the specified remote peer via the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Antes deste evento pode ser indicado por uma alteração de objeto, subscrições têm de ser efetuadas para o elemento especificado remoto através de <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Signaled when a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance with the specified ID is added, updated or removed by a remote peer.
trans-unit.target: Quando assinalado um <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> instância com o ID especificado é adicionada, atualizada ou removida por um elemento da rede remoto.

trans-unit.source: Type of object change specified by <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ObjectChangedEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Tipo de alteração de objeto especificado pelo <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ObjectChangedEventArgs"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance associated with this change has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> instância associada esta alteração foi eliminada.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerScope"></xref> in which the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance is registered.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerScope"> </xref> no qual o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> instância está registada.

trans-unit.source: PeerScope that specifies the scope in which the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> is registered.
trans-unit.target: PeerScope que especifica o âmbito no qual o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> está registado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> instância foi eliminada.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object used to marshal the event handler calls that are issued as a result of a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance change.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o objeto utilizado para empacotar referências das chamadas do processador de eventos que são emitidas como resultado de uma <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> instância alteração.

trans-unit.source: Object with an implementation of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISynchronizeInvoke"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: O objeto com uma implementação do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISynchronizeInvoke"> </xref> interface.

trans-unit.source: This object is used for event handler synchronization.
trans-unit.target: Este objeto é utilizado para a sincronização de processador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: The calling object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto chamado foi eliminado.

trans-unit.source: Populates the current <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance with the data obtained from the serialized source.
trans-unit.target: Preenche atual <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> instância com os dados obtidos a partir da origem serializada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> para preencher com dados.

trans-unit.source: The destination for the serialization.
trans-unit.target: O destino para a serialização.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> that represents a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref:System.String>que representa um <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> instância.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> representing the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que representa o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> instância foi eliminada.
